name: Heavymetalfoes Radionite
text:
2 Metalfoes Monsters 
If this card is Link Summoned: You can add 1 "Metalfoes" Pendulum Monster from your Deck to your Extra Deck face-up. Once per turn: You can target 1 other face-up card you control; destroy it, then add 1 face-up Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck to your hand. If a card(s) in your Pendulum Zone leaves the field: Draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Heavymetalfoes Radionite" once per turn.
